title: Acacia Cliffs Two Bedroom 950sqft
posting_body: Acacia Cliffs is located on a quiet property in the scenic Northwest Hills neighborhood of Austin, Texas.
We offer 1-bedrooms and 2-bedroom apartments in 6 attractive floor plans.
Each apartment home has modern upgrades, large closets, love the openness which flows nicely from living, dinning, kitchen.
In select apartment homes,  private patio, faux wood floors.
Acacia Cliffs offers abundance of amenities for an active lifestyle.
State of the art fitness center, sport court, billiards, cliff-side pool and sundeck await you.

Acacia Cliffs is minutes from MoPac Expressway(Loop), Highway 183/Loop 360 and FM2222 and seven miles north of Austin Central Business District and the University of Texas (UT)campus less then two minutes away from the UT shuttle pick and drop off.
Resident are within close proximity to recreational, entertainment and shopping areas such as Zilker Park, The Domain, The Arboretum.
